title: Colin Cowherd Podcast Prime Cuts -Kyler, Russ Takes, Joe Burrow on Wk 6 Chase GW TD, Coughing Vid + Week 7 Best Bets
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast Prime Cuts -Kyler, Russ Takes, Joe Burrow on Wk 6 Chase GW TD, Coughing Vid + Week 7 Best Bets
description:
This is Prime Cuts! The best of The Colin Cowherd Podcast. First, Top Takes, where Colin defends the frequently maligned Kyler Murray, gives his immediate thoughts on the late breaking trade sending Christian McCaffrey from the Panthers to the Niners and explains what’s really behind Russell Wilson’s dramatic drop off in Denver.

Then, Bengals Quarterback Joe Burrow on Bengals Week 6 win over the Saints in New Orleans, what he saw on his game winning 60-yard TD pass to Ja’Marr Chase, how his understanding of the QB position has changed since his rookie year, why he feels comfortable coming from behind, why he transferred from Ohio State to LSU, his first impression of Ed Orgeron, if he holds a grudge against Ohio State for not giving him a shot, his recall of passes to some of the lesser known targets in his NFL career, how he plans to stay focused heading into a softer part of the schedule, the real story behind the viral “cough video”, and what common phobias he’s scared or not scared of. 

Finally, Action Network's Chad Millman tells Colin if his NFL Week 6 picks are "sharp" or "square" for Steelers/Dolphins, Chiefs/Niners, Jets/Broncos, Seahawks/Chargers, Giants/Jags, Browns/Ravens, Packers/Commanders, and Texans/Raiders.

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #herd #volume

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
